knimeNode.name: Punctuation Erasure
knimeNode.shortDescription: Erases the punctuation characters of terms.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to erase punctuation characters of terms. The preprocessed terms are stored in the outgoing DataTable, as well as the documents containing these terms.
fullDescription.option: If deep preprocessing is checked, the terms contained inside the documents are preprocessed too, this means that the documents themselves are changed too, which is more time consuming.
Specifies the column containing the documents to preprocess.

If checked, the documents contained in the specified "Original Document column" are appended unchanged even if deep preprocessing is checked. This helps to keep the original documents in the output data table without the agonizing pain of joining.
Specifies the column containing the original documents which can be attached unchanged.
If checked unmodifiable terms will be preprocessed too.

inPort.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the terms and the documents as a bag of words.

outPort.name: Preprocessed terms and related documents output table

ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed terms and the documents as a bag of words.
